entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:07 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 6:00 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: W 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
